member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpoint.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpointController.GetAllFundraisingProducts(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves all the fundraising products.
member.param: A comma delimited list of columns to sort by. Field are sorted in ascending order by default. To have a field sort in descending order, preface it with the minus (-) sign.

member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpoint.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpointController.GetSingleFundRaisingProduct(System.Int64)
member.summary: Retrieves the details for a single fundraising product.

member.name: P:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpoint.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpointController.fundraisingProductsOutput.parentProductId
member.summary: If a product is part of a group this will be the id of the top level group product.

member.name: P:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpoint.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpointController.fundraisingProductsOutput.description
member.summary: A plain text description of the product.

member.name: P:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpoint.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpointController.fundraisingProductsOutput.webDescription
member.summary: A short rich text description of the product with html encoding.

member.name: P:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpoint.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpointController.fundraisingProductsOutput.webLongDescription
member.summary: A long rich text description of the product with html encoding.

member.name: P:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpoint.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpointController.fundraisingProductsOutput.productType
member.summary: A type of product this is. This informs the client which end point should be used when adding the product to the cart.

member.name: P:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpoint.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpointController.fundraisingProductsOutput.quantityAvailable
member.summary: How many of the current product are available.

member.name: P:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpoint.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpointController.fundraisingProductsOutput.hasComplexPricing
member.summary: If true, this indicates you must add the product to the cart in order to get an accurate price.

member.name: P:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpoint.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpointController.fundraisingProductsOutput.currencyId
member.summary: The currency the prices are in.

member.name: P:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpoint.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpointController.fundraisingProductsOutput.isSubscription
member.summary: Indicates if the product is subscription product. When adding subscription product to the cart, the quantity must be 1

member.name: P:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpoint.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpointController.fundraisingProductsOutput.ISBN
member.summary: If a product is type of publication then this field represent unique number for that product.

member.name: P:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpoint.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpointController.fundraisingProductsOutput.datepublished
member.summary: If a product is type of publication then this field represent the date when the product is being published.

member.name: P:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpoint.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpointController.fundraisingProductsOutput.assemblyType
member.summary: This field represents the AssemblyType/KitType of the product. Products that have a value here include sub products that are automatically added to the order. An assemblyType of 'Group' means the sub products are added as individual line items to the cart, and those line items can be removed independently of one another. Group products do not have a top level line item added to the cart that represents the product groupings. An assemblyType of 'Kit' means a line item is added to the cart for the top level product, and the sub product line items are tied directly to that top level product. Sub products in a kit can only be removed by removing that top level line item.

member.name: P:Aptify.Services.Generated.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpoint.v1_FundraisingProducts_FundraisingProductEndpointController.SingleFundraisingProduct.assemblyType
member.summary: This field represents the AssemblyType/KitType of the product. Products that have a value here include sub products that are automatically added to the order. An assemblyType of 'Group' means the sub products are added as individual line items to the cart, and those line items can be removed independently of one another. Group products do not have a top level line item added to the cart that represents the product groupings. An assemblyType of 'Kit' means a line item is added to the cart for the top level product, and the sub product line items are tied directly to that top level product. Sub products in a kit can only be removed by removing that top level line item.
